name: RUN! (itch) (spatel30)
description:
Welcome to the game page for RUN! Run is endless runner game where you are a cube trying to dodge obstacles and get the highest score possible!

**This was my first ever game made (created a year back!), just thought I'd upload it here for people to play and see my first ever game I made!

Controls - 

A - Move Left.

D - Move Right.

Esc - Pause Game.
